text: This trial did not include any endpoints for recurrence or survival in these patients.LoE $^ { 2 + + }$ As part of a systematic review371 including 22 articles20,21,141,145,182,192,196,199,203,218,372-395 and evaluating the preoperative imaging and surgical staging of PALNs in locally advanced cervical cancer (FIGO stages IB2-IVA), the proportions of PALNs that were positive on histological analysis when findings on imaging were abnormal were $2 0 \%$ to $6 6 \%$ for CT scan, $0 \%$ to $2 7 \%$ for MRI, $8 6 \%$ to $1 0 0 \%$ for PET, and $5 0 \%$ to $7 5 \%$ for PET-CT.

<reference text>: This trial did not include any endpoints for recurrence or survival in these patients.LoE $^ { 2 + + }$ As part of a systematic review371 including 22 articles20,21,141,145,182,192,196,199,203,218,372-395 and evaluating the preoperative imaging and surgical staging of PALNs in locally advanced cervical cancer (FIGO stages IB2-IVA), the proportions of PALNs that were positive on histological analysis when findings on imaging were abnormal were $2 0 \%$ to $6 6 \%$ for CT scan, $0 \%$ to $2 7 \%$ for MRI, $8 6 \%$ to $1 0 0 \%$ for PET, and $5 0 \%$ to $7 5 \%$ for PET-CT.

response: 对于局部晚期宫颈癌（FIGO分期IB2-IVA）患者来说，积极进行腹腔淋巴结的影像学评估和手术分期具有重要性。在一项系统评价中，研究了包括22篇文章，显示在影像学异常的情况下，腹腔淋巴结的积极性分析结果有一定比例呈阳性。其中CT扫描的阳性比例为20%至66%，MRI为0%至27%，PET为86%至100%，PET-CT为50%至75%。这些数据表明，通过积极的影像学评估和手术分期，可以更准确地评估患者的病情，有助于指导后续治疗方案的制定。因此，对于这类患者来说，及时且准确的腹腔淋巴结的影像学评估和手术分期至关重要。
